mapper.insert: insert into fac_sta (ID, TYPE, CAT, BRAND, NAME, OWNER, REPO_ID, REPO_NUM, TOTAL, FREE, WORKING, MAINTAIN, BAD, COMMENT) values (#{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CAT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{BRAND,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OWNER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{REPO_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{REPO_NUM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TOTAL,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{FREE,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{WORKING,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{MAINTAIN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{BAD,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{COMMENT,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update fac_sta
TYPE = #{TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CAT = #{CAT,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BRAND = #{BRAND,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNER = #{OWNER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REPO_ID = #{REPO_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REPO_NUM = #{REPO_NUM,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTAL = #{TOTAL,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FREE = #{FREE,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WORKING = #{WORKING,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MAINTAIN = #{MAINTAIN,jdbcType=INTEGER},
BAD = #{BAD,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMMENT = #{COMMENT,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update fac_sta set TYPE = #{TYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAT = #{CAT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND = #{BRAND,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{NAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER = #{OWNER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPO_ID = #{REPO_ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REPO_NUM = #{REPO_NUM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTAL = #{TOTAL,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FREE = #{FREE,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WORKING = #{WORKING,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MAINTAIN = #{MAINTAIN,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BAD = #{BAD,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMMENT = #{COMMENT,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from fac_sta where TYPE = #{TYPE} and CAT = #{CAT} and COMPANY = #{BAND} limit #{ST}, #{EACH}

select * from fac_sta where TYPE = #{TYPE} limit #{ST}, #{EACH}
select * from fac_sta where TYPE = #{TYPE} and CAT = #{CAT} limit #{ST}, #{EACH}
